name: mm_wdq
title: WikiData Query (WDQ)
description: A powerful API to interrogate Wikidata, used by many tools and third-party projects.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wikidata_game
title: The Wikidata Game
description: A set of games to quickly add statements to Wikidata.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_terminator
title: Wikidata Terminator
description: Shows identical terms (labels) with missing descriptions, popular items with missing labels etc.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_reasonator
title: Reasonator
description: Human-readable display of Wikidata.
keywords: wikidata, reasonator, api, visual, language, sparql
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_nitol
title: Not in the other language
description: Finds Wikidata items with a Wikipedia page in language A but not in B.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_mixnmatch
title: Mix'n'match
description: GLAM catalog/Wikidata matching tool; red link lists on steroids.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_glamorous2
title: GLAMorous 2
description: A tool to keep track usage and views of Commons images on other projects.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_flickr2commons
title: Flickr2Commons
description: Can upload single and multiple files from Flickr to Commons.
keywords: commons, flickr, files, multimedia, transfer, copy, tooltranslate
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_geograph2commons
title: Geograph2Commons
description: Can upload a single file from geograph.co.uk etc. to Commons.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_commonshelper
title: CommonsHelper
description: Can transfer files from wiki(p|m)edia to Commons.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_add_information
title: Add information
description: Adds an {{Information}} template to a file on Commons.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_glamorous
title: GLAMorous
description: A tool to keep track of Commons images used on other projects.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_baglama
title: BaGLAMa
description: Monthly view counts for pages containing images from selected Commons categories. Supersedec by BaGLAMa2.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_baglama2
title: BaGLAMa 2
description: Monthly view counts for pages containing images from selected Commons categories.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_treeviews
title: TreeViews
description: Monthly view statistics for category trees.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_unused_files
title: Unused files
description: A list of files not used on Wikipedia, from a Commons category tree.
keywords: glam, files, images, views, commons, list, unused
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_deep_insight
title: Deep InSight
description: Shows unsighted pages by category, including subcategories.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_deep_out_of_sight
title: Deep out-of-sight
description: Shows out-of-date sighted versions by category, including subcategories.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_random_out_of_sight
title: Random out-of-sight
description: Shows out-of-date sighted versions that only differ a little by size (typo fixes etc).
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_out_of_sight
title: Out-of-sight
description: Randomly shows articles in de.wikipedia with out-of-date sighted versions.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_book2scroll
title: Book2scroll
description: A book reader for Wikisource.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_map2wp
title: Map2WP
description: Attempts to map DNB articles on wikisource to wikipedia.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wikisource_dnb
title: Wikisource DNB
description: Looks for inconsistencies in the wikisource link structures of the DNB.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_dnb_ratios
title: DNB ratios
description: Gives page length ratios between Wikisource and Wikipedia articles.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_dnb_link_finder
title: DNB link finder
description: Finds links to Google books DNB that would better point to Wikisource.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_geohack
title: Geohack
description: Meta-map tool. Used on Wikipedia. [example: Berlin]
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_cas
title: CAS
description: Shows links to CAS numbers for chemicals. [example: Trisodium phosphate]
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_isin
title: ISIN
description: Shows links to ISIN numbers (stock market) based on parameter.
keywords: wikipedia, infobox, isin, stock market, external
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_prep_bio
title: PrepBio
description: Helps to generate infobox templates for biographies.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_html2wiki
title: HTML2wiki
description: Can convert some HTML into wikitext, especially tables.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_tab2wiki
title: Tab2Wiki
description: Converts tables (tab-delimited, e.g. copied from Excel) to Wikitext tables.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wd_reconcile
title: Wikidata Reconcile
description: A reconciliation API for Wikidata.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_pagepile
title: PagePile
description: A tool to generate and manage lists of pages, and to use them across many other tools.
keywords: list, lists, wikipedia, wikidata, generator, pagepile
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_pagepile2kml
title: PagePile2KML
description: Generates KML from a PagePile list of Wikidata items or articles (via Wikidata).
keywords: KML, map, maps, wikipedia, wikidata, pagepile
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_makeref
title: MakeRef
description: A form to generate references.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_isbn2wiki
title: ISBN2Wiki
description: Generates wikitext reference texts for ISBNs.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_get_article_intro
title: GetArticleIntro
description: Returns the first sentence of an article as JSONP.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_update_article_counter
title: Update article counter
description: Updates the number of articles in a WikiProject.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_templator
title: Templator
description: Generates templates from forms.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_missing_topics
title: MissingTopics
description: Finds the 'most wanted' missing topics in an article or category tree.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wiki_todo
title: Wiki ToDo
description: Finds articles with things to do for you!
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_most_wanted
title: Most wanted
description: Topics, measured by redlink count, for several languages.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_get_distinct_authors
title: GetDistinctAuthors
description: Gives the distinct (non-IP) list of editors on a set of articles.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_herding_sheep
title: Herding Sheep
description: Shows the (last) edits of all users in a user category.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_trans_parent
title: Trans-parent
description: Finds potential translators between two languages amongst Wikipedians.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_data_url
title: Data URL
description: Demo for images as data URLs in Wikipedia, with or without WEBP.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_joanjoc
title: JoanJoc's tools
description: Something with language links.
author: Magnus Manske, JoanJoc

name: mm_no_information
title: No Information
description: Files with no {{Information}} template. Merged from 'all_no_info' and 'mynoinfo' on toolserver.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_usual_suspects
title: The Usual Suspects
description: File management tool, merged 'Bad Boys' and 'Bad Old Ones' from toolserver.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_file_reuse
title: File reuse
description: Allows you to drag'n'drop a file onto it, and show a thumbnail and attribution.
keywords: commons, files, reuse, attribution, demo, drag'n'drop
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_fist
title: FIST
description: The Free Image Search Tool.
keywords: external, search, images, files, commons, wikipedia, flickr, geograph, pagepile
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_url2commons
title: URL2Commons
description: Can transfer files from a list of URLs to Commons.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_file_siblings
title: File siblings
description: Builds, for a file, an HTML fragment with thumbnails of related images.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_file_siblings_interface
title: File siblings interface
description: Wikipedia JavaScript interface for File siblings.
keywords: commons, files, category, gallery, wikipedia, interface, javascript
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_file_dupes
title: FileDupes
description: For finding image duplicates. A merge of 'userdupes' and 'commons_dupes' from toolserver.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_multidesc
title: MultiDesc
description: Generates multilingual gallery and file descriptions (a merge of 'whatisthat' and 'commons_sumitup' from toolserver).
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wiki2playlist
title: Wiki2playlist
description: Generates a .M3U playlist from files hosted on Commons.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_icommons
title: iCommons
description: A Commons browser for mobile devices.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_flickrfree
title: FlickrFree
description: Shows free, recently uploaded images on Flickr, ready for transfer to Commons.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_catscan2
title: CatScan 2
description: For complex category tree and template intersection.
keywords: category, categories, templates, wikipedia, trees, query, pagepile
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_reverse_category_tree
title: Reverse category tree
description: Get the categories a page or file is in, all the way down to the roots.
keywords: category, categories, wikipedia, commons, query, trees
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_pages_in_categories
title: Pages in categories
description: Counts pages in a category tree.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_catfood
title: CatFood
description: RSS feeds for pages and files based on category or user name.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_commons_image_feed
title: Commons image feed
description: RSS image feeds for Commons categories to use in screensavers etc.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_catnap
title: CatNap
description: Lists Wikipedia articles in a category grouped by their other categories.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_crosscats
title: CrossCats
description: Finds articles that ought to be in a category tree in a language via categories in other languages.
keywords: category, categories, wikipedia, interlanguage, tree, query
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_random_page_in_cat
title: Random page in category
description: Redirects to a random page in a category.
keywords: random, wikipedia, category, categories, tree, redirect
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_toolscript
title: ToolScript
description: An interface to write and run JavaScript code, with convenient classes to get category trees, run WDQ queries etc.
keywords: javascript, scripting, code, wdq, categories, tree
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_misstake
title: Ranked missing articles
description: Finds and ranks missing articles from page links
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_redirector
title: Redirector
description: Finds wanted redirects across WIkipedia languages
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_persondata
title: Persondata
description: Generates {{Persondata}} template (de/en)
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_related_places
title: Related places
description: Generates KML for all places related to (linked from) an article
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_bong
title: Bong
description: Bing-like Wikimedia search interface.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_commons_api
title: Commons API
description: An experimental API to return author and media data from Commons as XML.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wd_species_commons
title: Wikidata species images
description: Wikidata items about species that have no image, but potential images on Commons.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_edit_counter
title: Quick edit counter
description: Simple user edit count breakdown, as a replacement for when supercount is down.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_autodesc
title: AutoDesc
description: Wikidata automated description API
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_get_item_names
title: Get item names
description: Generates a list of Wikidata labels for a list of items, with language fallback
keywords: wikidata, label, labels, name, names, language, languages, pagepile
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_linked_items
title: Linked items
description: Generates a list of Wikidata items, from wikitext links or PagePile
keywords: wikidata, item, items, link, links, wikipedia, pagepile
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wikishootme
title: Wiki ShootMe!
description: Shows Wikidata items in your area that do not have an image
keywords: wikidata, commons, image, around, coordinate, coordinates
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wikisoba
title: WikiSoba
description: A demo for a quiz system, can utilize Wikipedia pages as page source
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_widar
title: WiDaR
description: OAuth login wrapper for several other tools. Wikidata-centric.
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_listeria
title: Listeria
description: Generates lists on Wikipedias, based on Wikidata queries. Daily updates.
keywords: list, lists, wdq, sparql, wikidata, query, generator
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_metamine
title: MetaMine
description: Demo tool to show crossover between Wikidata and ContentMine
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_tooldir
title: Tool directory
description: Alternative display of Hay's tool directory
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_petscan
title: PetScan
description: Replacement for CatScan2, QuickIntersection, Creator, Autolist etc.
keywords: categories, intersection, WDQS, SPARQL, pagepile, wikidata
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_tooltranslate
title: Tool Translate
description: Community-driven translation of tool interfaces
author: Magnus Manske

name: mm_wdfist
title: Wikidata FIST
description: The Free Image Search Tool for Wikidata. Find items without image, but images in associated Wikipedia articles.
keywords: wikidata, images, files, wdq, pagepile, sparql, petscan, tooltranslate
author: Magnus Manske
